div.h2: CARIN RTPBC Billing Unit Value Set

div.p: This value set contains the quantity unit of measure to be used when requesting predetermination of benefits for prescription-related products
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://ncpdp.org/unit-of-measure
CodeDisplay
GMGram
MLMilliliter
EAEach

title.value: CARIN RTPBC Billing Unit Value Set

description.value: This value set contains the quantity unit of measure to be used when requesting predetermination of benefits for prescription-related products
